entry.title: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 10:51AM MDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The National Weather Service in Riverton Wyoming continues the Flood Warning for the following river in Wyoming... Bear River below Pixley Dam affecting Lincoln County. .Mountain snowmelt continues through mid-week before a weekend storm system brings cooler weather. This will slow mountain snowmelt above 8,000 feet, decreasing flows on tributaries feeding the Bear River.
